summary: A Unified UNP HDT Bodyslide conversion of ralfetas's Pampas Set and kky's Pampas Set Extended - Mesh Retexture Add-on both of which are originally for FO4.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]This is a UUNP armor, you will need bodyslide to use this.
[size=5]**PLEASE READ ALL THIS**[/size][size=4]- WHAT IS THIS MOD -

[/size]
[/b][size=2]Pampas Set Extended is a massive overhaul of my previous mod ([url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83959?]Pampas Set - UUNP - HDT[/url]﻿) that adds about 80 more Bodysuits from the original [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/19263/?]Pampas Set - CBBE - BodySlide by ralfetas[/url] AND adds about 80 more Bodysuits from [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/29233?]Pampas Set Extended - Mesh Retexture Add-on by kky[/url]﻿. AND after this original release, there is a lot more to come.

[/size][size=4]- WHAT'S INCLUDED -[/size]
10 Bodysuits + an alternate version of each bodysuit
Matching Boots (10 of them)
1 Top
1 Pair of Pants
All that with NINE themes:
Basic | BOS | Gunner | Institute | Minutemen | NukaCola | VaultTech | Raider | ZColor
AND 10 plain colors (currently haven't integrated the alternate meshes for them).

Let me know if something doesn't work and I'll try to fix it. Nonconstructive criticism not welcome. 

[b][size=4]- Planned Updates -[/size][/b]
3 Belts
A pair of boots
Elbow pads (Left/Right/Both)
Gloves
2 Jackets

[size=4][b]- REQUIREMENTS - [/b]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url], by Hydrogen
HDT physics compatible skeleton(Groovtama's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XPMS Extended[/url] recommended)
The latest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]

[size=6]- INSTALLATION -[/size]
To make it easier for people who have previously installed my previous mod so they don't have to install the same Pampas Set Textures all over again, there are two sets of installation instructions:

[size=4]A) IF YOU [/size][size=6]PREVIOUSLY INSTALLED[/size][size=4][b] [/b][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83959?][b]Pampas Set - UUNP - HDT[/b][/url]
[list=1]
[*]Download and Install both the [b]Main Files[/b] and the [b]C) Pampas Set - (Update to Extended) (Requires Main Files)[/b]

[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Default body is 7BO so if you use that then [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2]stop here and enjoy. If you wish to customize your shape then read on.[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Open the BodySlide utility. Search for "Pampas" (utilize the outfits that start with BS - 2018 Pampas Set).[/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2]Tweak the sliders to your liking, or use a preset you have already created (DO NOT USE THE CLIPPING ZAP SLIDER IF YOU PLAN ON USING THE ALTERNATIVE VERSIONS OF THE OUTFITS).[/size]
[*][size=2]Obtain in game using either the console "help Pampas" (no quotes) or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu - Ultimate Mod Explorer[/url].[/size]
[/list]

[b][size=4]B) IF YOU [/size][size=6]DID NOT[/size][size=4] INSTALL [/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83959?][size=4][b]Pampas Set - UUNP - HDT[/b][/size][/url]
[/b][list=1]
[*][size=2][size=2]Download and install the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/25/?]Bodyslide and Outfit Studio[/url] utility.[/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Download and Install both the [b]Main Files[/b] and the [b]B) Pampas Set Extended FULL (Requires Main Files)[/b] (automatically, using NMM or MO, or if manually then [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2][size=2]extract the file into Skyrim's Data folder).[/size][/size][/size]
[*][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2][size=2]Default body is 7BO so if you use that then [/size][/size][/size][/size][/size][size=2][size=2]stop here and enjoy. If you wish to customize your shape then read on.[/size][/size][/size]
[*]Open the BodySlide utility. Search for "Pampas" (utilize the outfits that start with BS - 2018 Pampas Set).
[*][size=2]Tweak the sliders to your liking, or use a preset you have already created  (DO NOT USE THE CLIPPING ZAP SLIDER IF YOU PLAN ON USING THE ALTERNATIVE VERSIONS OF THE OUTFITS)..[/size]
[*][size=2]Obtain in game using either the console "help Pampas" (no quotes) or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64905/?]AddItemMenu - Ultimate Mod Explorer[/url].[/size]
[/list]

[size=4]- CREDITS/THANKS-[/size]
[size=2][b][url=https://www.flickr.com/photos/39994399@N04/]Cakesicles[/url] [/b]for their awesome screenshots. :D

[/size][i][size=2][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/19263/?]Ralfetas[/url] for the original work on the Pampas set, [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/mods/29233?]kky [/url]for his ﻿[/size][/i][size=2][i]Mesh Retexture Add-on for the Pampas Set, [/i][/size][i][size=2]and them both for allowing me to release this.[/size][/i][/center][center][i][size=2]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3330686/?]Caliente[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/4291759/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/4291759/?][/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/fallout4/users/4291759/?]ousnius[/url] for the Bodyslide and Outfit Studio utility, without which this conversion would never have been attempted.[/size][/i]
[size=2]
[/size][/center]
author: blazingsai
